dmca.title: [ABUSE] Notice of Copyright Infringement/DMCA Take Down Demand per 17 USC 512 (c)
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf
Of Policy Enforcement
Posted At: Tuesday, May 23, 2006 6:47 AM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Notice of Copyright Infringement/DMCA Take
Down Demand per 17 USC 512 (c)]
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Notice of Copyright Infringement/DMCA Take Down
Demand per 17 USC 512 (c)]


-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

For your review.

Thank you,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

- -------- Original Message --------
From: - Mon May 22 22:43:54 2006
X-Mozilla-Status: 0001
X-Mozilla-Status2: 00000000
Received: from localhost ([127.0.0.1] helo=[216.185.111.52])        by
mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com)
with esmtp (Exim)        id 1FiNo6-0007XB-Vo; Mon, 22 May 2006 22:43:43
-0500
Received: from mx01.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.180]
helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com)        by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from
webmaster@proxify.com)        with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256)
(Exim) id 1FiNo5-0007X2-8b        for abuse@theplanet.com; Mon, 22 May
2006
22:43:41 -0500
Received: from frak.upsideout.com ([66.98.178.22])        by
mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from webmaster@proxify.com)        with
esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1FiNo2-0008nN-G6
for
abuse@theplanet.com; Mon, 22 May 2006 22:43:41 -0500
Received: from ool-44c15810.dyn.optonline.net ([68.193.88.16]
helo=[192.168.0.100])        by frak.upsideout.com with esmtpsa
(TLSv1:RC4-SHA:128) (Exim 4.52)        id 1FiNnz-0008SS-8u        for
abuse@theplanet.com; Mon, 22 May 2006 23:43:35 -0400
Mime-Version: 1.0 (Apple Message framework v750)
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
Message-Id: <99DE8EA9-7F88-4230-A64E-867DE0C0FC69@proxify.com>
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=US-ASCII; delsp=yes; format=flowed
To: abuse@theplanet.com
From: Justin S. <webmaster@proxify.com>
Date: Mon, 22 May 2006 23:43:39 -0400
X-Mailer: Apple Mail (2.750)
X-AntiAbuse: This header was added to track abuse,        please include
it
with any abuse report
X-AntiAbuse: Primary Hostname - frak.upsideout.com
X-AntiAbuse: Original Domain - theplanet.com
X-AntiAbuse: Originator/Caller UID/GID - [47 12] / [47 12]
X-AntiAbuse: Sender Address Domain - proxify.com
X-Source:
X-Source-Args:
X-Source-Dir:
Received-SPF: pass (mx01.filter.theplanet.com: domain of proxify.com
designates 66.98.178.22 as permitted sender)        client-ip=66.98.178.22;
envelope-from=webmaster@proxify.com;        helo=frak.upsideout.com;
X-Spam-Level: ---------------------------------------------------
X-Spam-Score: -101.2
Subject: [ABUSE] Notice of Copyright Infringement/DMCA Take Down
Demand per        17 USC 512 (c)
X-BeenThere: abuse@lists.theplanet.com
X-Mailman-Version: 2.1.7
Precedence: list
List-Id: <abuse.lists.theplanet.com>
List-Unsubscribe: <http://lists.theplanet.com/mailman/listinfo/abuse>,
<mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=unsubscribe>
List-Post: <mailto:abuse@lists.theplanet.com>
List-Help: <mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=help>
List-Subscribe: <http://lists.theplanet.com/mailman/listinfo/abuse>,
<mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=subscribe>
Sender: abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
Errors-To: abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com

To Whom It May Concern:

I am writing to file a notice of copyright infringement in accordance
with the Digital Millennium Copyright Act.

1. The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on "http://
proxify.com/". Proxify.com is a wholly owned subsidiary of UpsideOut,
Inc. and has been in operation since 2003-04-14.

2. The material that we believe is infringing the copyrighted work
listed in item #1 appears on "http://miniproxy.net/" and "http://
japanproxy.com/" which are located at IP address "69.93.247.30" and
"http://smallproxy.com/" which is located at IP address "70.86.148.218".
Specifically, the material is, "smallProxy.com is a free web-based
anonymous proxy service which allows anyone to surf the Web privately
and securely. Just enter a URL (website address) in the form above, you
can use websites but they cannot uniquely identify or track you.
smallProxy.com hides your IP address and our encrypted connection
prevents monitoring of your network traffic.".
This material is copied except that all the appearances of our trademark
and tradename "Proxify" have been changed to their name.


3. My contact information:
Name: Justin Schlecter
Company: UpsideOut, Inc. D.B.A Proxify
Address: 1333A N. Ave., STE 315, New Rochelle, NY 10804
Phone: 1-877-PROXIFY
Email: webmaster@proxify.com


4. Contact information for the owner of the allegedly infringing
material:
   ServerCube.com
   Server Cube (tokyofriends@gmail.com)
   +1.3475636346
   Fax: +1.2123345169
   Prince Street Station
   P.O. Box 55
   New York, NY 10012
   US


5. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials
described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the
copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the
notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am
authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is
allegedly infringed.

Signed,
Justin Schlecter, 2006-05-22
Proxify.com Administrator
1-877-PROXIFY
